meanings.sent1: I missteer the car and ended up on the wrong road.
meanings.sent2: Please don't missteer the ship towards the dangerous rocks.
meanings.sent3: Trying to missteer the cat into the bathtub was a hilarious challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her false directions missteered me into a maze of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The faulty GPS missteered us into a deserted area.

meanings.definition: A mistake or error in direction
meanings.sent1: Making a missteer in navigation can lead to getting lost.
meanings.sent2: The missteer in the map caused us to take the longer route.
meanings.sent3: His missteer in the treasure hunt made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The missteer in the blueprint led to a crooked building.
meanings.sent5: The missteer in the flight plan resulted in a delay.
